note.p: Education: School at Tiverton, Devon; Balliol College, Oford; BA (1724); Emmanuel College, Cambridge; MA (1727), DD (1744)

Career: Ordained deacon and priest (1727); Private chaplain to Archbishop Lancelot Blackburne of York; Prebendary of York (1728-1749); Prebendary of Southwell (1728-1749); Rector of Kirkby Overblow, Yorkshire (1729-1749); Sub-dean of York (1730-1749); Archdeacon of York (1730-1751); Rector of Etton, Yorkshire (1731); Chaplain to the King (1734-1749); Vicar of Kirkby-in-Cleveland, (1737-1749); Prebendary of Westminster (1739-1749); Bishop of Norwich (1749-1761); Preceptor to the Prince of Wales (1751); Bishop of London (1761); Privy Councillor (1761)
